meanings: bring about a revolution[a large reform]
Verb be revolutionized, be reformed, be changed

meanings.meaning: a copernican revolution in modern art

vlive.korean: [우리에겐 큰 변혁이 필요해] 우리 스태프들 마저도! Even our staff members! 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 ep01_새로운 시즌, 새로운 제작진!
변혁이라는 점 좋습니다. I like the sound of that. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]변혁의 사랑 X 앞터V (Revolutionary Love X Early Interview)
vlive.english: I like the sound of that.

vlive.korean: 변혁 화이팅! - 변혁 화이팅! Fighting, "Byun Hyuk"! - Fighting, "Byun Hyuk"! 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]변혁의 사랑 X 앞터V (Revolutionary Love X Early Interview)

저는 '변혁의 사랑' 에서 변혁 역을 맡았고요 변혁이고. I play "Byun Hyuk" in the drama series, "Revolutionary Love." 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]변혁의 사랑 X 앞터V (Revolutionary Love X Early Interview)
